QuestData.Title: Ring of Trials: Hol'yelaa
QuestData.Description: You won your first two fights, but it's only going to get tougher from here!$b$bYour next fight is against Hol'yelaa, a former rangari who is as crazy as they come.$b$bNo, really... Hol'yelaa is bonkers!$b$bYears ago, while on a scouting mission, he single handedly saved his entire rangari unit from a pack of Garn. But something inside of him snapped....$b$bIt wasn't long before Hol'yelaa went completely marbles and turned on his own unit!$b$bAlright, the pep talk is over! Get in there and kick some ass!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A former member of the elite rangari, he attacks with deadly precision.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Hol'yelaa in the Ring of Trials.
QuestData.CompletionText: What are you doing standing around? Get in the arena and spill some blood!
QuestData.RewardText: Watching you fight in the arena is like witnessing an artist create a masterpiece!$b$bWell, a masterpiece of blood and shattered bones... but hey, everyone's got to be good at something right?$b$bHere's your cut of the profit! That fight was so good I actually thought about giving you a bonus!

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Guzrug to begin the fight
